text: Alexander Horvát (born 25 September 2000) is a Slovak footballer who plays for Petržalka, on loan from Spartak Trnava, as a midfielder. ==Club career== Horvát made his professional Slovak league debut for Spartak Trnava against AS Trenčín on 8 December 2018.SPARTAK TRNAVA VS. TRENČÍN 3 - 1 08.12.2018, soccerway.com ==References== ==External links== * FC Spartak Trnava official club profile * Futbalnet profile * * Fortuna Liga profile Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Slovak footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:FC Spartak Trnava players Category:Slovak Super Liga players
title: Alexander Horvát
